blogs.title: 7 Frontend JavaScript Frameworks Loved by Developers in 2022
blogs.readHighlight: is undoubtedly quite popular in building interactive and multimedia content. In 2021, it completed the ninth year in a row as the most commonly used programming language. A JavaScript frontend framework is a collection of JavaScript code libraries that helps developers with standard programming features and tasks. In addition, it offers reusable code components, a universal development environment, compilers, toolsets, code libraries, APIs, etc., to facilitate the app.
blogs.author: Dennis Kibet
